Requirements Your eidolon is condensed.

Your eidolon suddenly shifts itself into a terrifying shape of its choosing, rather than a simple mound, by closely controlling the positioning of its component bodies. The eidolon attempts to [[/act demoralize]] a creature within 15 feet; this Demoralize attempt loses the auditory trait, gains the visual trait, and the eidolon doesn't take a â€“4 circumstance penalty to the check if they don't share a language with their target. On a success or critical success, the target is additionally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] for 1 round.
